column4: hi all i have problem in my Drivers i can't update it what to do ??
i don't have any drive setup
i need to update my drivers what can i do i have Gigabyte Ga-8i945G Pro
what makes you think you need to update your drivers?
what do you mean by 'I can't open...'?
you don't need new drivers. Run winecfg and configure your graphics appropriately for running games under wine
did you get a Linux client for Second Life?
I thought Second Life was a Windows app. If not, then the winecfg advice doesn't apply (thanks Pici)
what framerates do you get when you run glxgears?
what framerates do you get when you run glxgears?
so run glxgears and find out
it is a program. Open a terminal and type glxgears
your graphics are perfectly capable. I don't know why Second Life won't run. I suggest you contact Linden Labs and ask them about the problem.
